glsa.title: Wordpress: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Wordpress contains SQL injection and XSS vulnerabilities.

background.p: WordPress is a PHP and MySQL based content management and publishing system.

description.p: Due to a lack of input validation, WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection and XSS attacks.

impact.p: An attacker could use the SQL injection vulnerabilities to gain information from the database. Furthermore the cross-site scripting issues give an attacker the ability to inject and execute malicious script code or to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, potentially compromising the victim's browser.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
